description: Returns information about comments made on the comparison between two commits.

parameters.name: repositoryName
parameters.description: The name of the repository where you want to compare commits.

parameters.name: afterCommitId
parameters.description: To establish the directionality of the comparison, the full commit ID of the after commit.

nested_items.name: commentsForComparedCommitData
nested_items.description: A list of comment objects on the compared commit.

nested_items.name: repositoryName
nested_items.description: The name of the repository that contains the compared commits.

nested_items.name: beforeCommitId
nested_items.description: The full commit ID of the commit used to establish the before of the comparison.

nested_items.name: afterCommitId
nested_items.description: The full commit ID of the commit used to establish the after of the comparison.

nested_items.name: beforeBlobId
nested_items.description: The full blob ID of the commit used to establish the before of the comparison.

nested_items.name: afterBlobId
nested_items.description: The full blob ID of the commit used to establish the after of the comparison.

nested_items.name: filePath
nested_items.description: The name of the file being compared, including its extension and subdirectory, if any.

nested_items.name: filePosition
nested_items.description: The position of a change in a compared file, in line number format.

nested_items.name: relativeFileVersion
nested_items.description: In a comparison of commits or a pull request, whether the change is in the before or after of that comparison.

nested_items.name: comments
nested_items.description: An array of comment objects. Each comment object contains information about a comment on the comparison between commits.

nested_items.name: commentId
nested_items.description: The system-generated comment ID.

nested_items.name: content
nested_items.description: The content of the comment.

nested_items.name: inReplyTo
nested_items.description: The ID of the comment for which this comment is a reply, if any.

nested_items.name: creationDate
nested_items.description: The date and time the comment was created, in timestamp format.

nested_items.name: lastModifiedDate
nested_items.description: The date and time the comment was most recently modified, in timestamp format.

nested_items.name: authorArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the person who posted the comment.

nested_items.name: deleted
nested_items.description: A Boolean value indicating whether the comment has been deleted.

nested_items.name: clientRequestToken
nested_items.description: A unique, client-generated idempotency token that, when provided in a request, ensures the request cannot be repeated with a changed parameter. If a request is received with the same parameters and a token is included, the request returns information about the initial request that used that token.

nested_items.name: callerReactions
nested_items.description: The emoji reactions to a comment, if any, submitted by the user whose credentials are associated with the call to the API.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: reactionCounts
nested_items.description: A string to integer map that represents the number of individual users who have responded to a comment with the specified reactions.
(string) ---
(integer) ---

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: An enumeration token that can be used in a request to return the next batch of the results.
